16242.quoteText:
These rights may include:

  • To access your Personal Data held by us (right to access);
  • To rectify inaccurate Personal Data and, taking into account the purpose of processing the Personal Data, ensure it is complete (right to rectification);
  • To erase/delete your Personal Data, to the extent permitted by applicable data protection laws (right to erasure. right to be forgotten);
16242.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data

tosdr.case: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

16246.quoteText: <li>To restrict our processing of your Personal Data to the extent permitted by law (right to restriction of processing);

16247.quoteText: To transfer your Personal Data to another controller, to the extent possible (right to data portability);

16248.quoteText: Purposes for which we process Personal Data and the legal bases on which we rely
16248.title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data

16249.quoteText: For the avoidance of doubt, our Privacy Statement does not apply to the extent we process Personal Data in the role of a processor on behalf of our customers.
16249.title: The service informs users that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

tosdr.case: The service informs you that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

16250.quoteText: Third-party social media and advertising networks, which usually act as separate controllers, so that we can advertise on their platforms;
16250.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not involved in its operation

tosdr.case: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation

16251.quoteText: if we are involved in a merger, reorganization, asset sale or business combination.
16251.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

tosdr.case: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

16252.quoteText:
As described in the "International transfer of Personal Data" section of our full Privacy Statement, we have implemented safeguards to ensure an adequate level of data protection where your Personal Data is transferred to countries outside the EEA, such as standard contractual clauses for the transfer of Personal Data as approved by the European Commission (Art.
46 GDPR).
16252.title: Personal information that is shared outside its jurisdiction is processed according to the original jurisdiction’s data protection standards

tosdr.case: Personal information that is shared outside its jurisdiction is processed according to the original jurisdiction’s data protection standards

Customers may not, and may not allow any third party, including its users, to use services to display, store, process, or transmit, or permit use of services to display, store, process, or transmit:

Customers may not use a service to, nor allow its users or any third party to use a service to:

II.
Send, upload, distribute, or disseminate, or offer to do the same, with respect to unlawful, defamatory, harassing, abusive, fraudulent, infringing, obscene, excessively profane, hateful, violent, or otherwise objectionable material,
